content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
- Boiler at Position (-46.5, -119.0)
- Steam Engine at Position (-40.5, -113.5)
- PipeGroup connecting these entities, starting from Position (-48.5, -122.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0) with a Wooden Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0)

### Copper Ore Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0)

### Additional Structures
- Stone Furnace at Position (6.0, -62.0) with an Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) and a Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5)
- Lab with input of Automation Science Pack at Position (not specified)
- Multiple PipeGroups and ElectricityGroup connecting various parts of the map

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Setting Research
- Ensure that the research tree is initialized before attempting to set research.

### Errors with Inventory Management
- Verify that the required items are available in the inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Ensure that all fuel-dependent entities, such as boilers and burner mining drills, have adequate fuel to operate.

### Errors in Power Network Connections
- Make sure that all electricity-dependent entities are connected to a power network to receive electricity.

### Errors with Resource Processing
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt to avoid idle time.

### Errors with Inserters
- Confirm that inserters are powered and correctly positioned to pick up and drop items efficiently.
